attributes.action: Make public the findings of the drugs advisory body, concerning reclassification of cannabis 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On today April 28th 2008, Gordon Brown has  told the press he plans to push ahead with the reclassification of cannabis from grade C to grade B, despite the drugs advisory body findings suggesting it should stay at grade C, please sign this petition to get the findings of the drugs advisory body (ACMD) made public.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
